thread.title: Vijay Yesudas croons for Rahul Raj
thread.title_full: Vijay Yesudas croons for Rahul Raj - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Vijay Yesudas croons for Rahul Raj
text:
Vijay Yesudas, son of veteran singer Yesudas sings for two Malayalm movies that are on the making. The actor was in Kochi recently to record it. He took his social networking page to let out his happiness.
The singer wrote, "Gonna sing for Mr.Rahul Raj - Composer again after Kohinoor - Now for the Mammootty starrer ‪#‎WHITE also Starring Huma Qureshi - Recording on the new Avantone Pro BV1 mic My Studio Kochi.' (sic)
The composer and singer recorded the songs in the midnight. Vijay wrote, "Now that's for Suresh Gopi's Son Gokul suresh - another Rahul Raj - Composer Rocking Song coming soon -‪#‎backtobackrecs ‪#‎latenightrecording malayalam song rec after midnight." (sic)
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
